nerd.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: someone who seems only interested in computers and other technical things â€“ used to show disapproval
nerd.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: someone who seems very boring and unfashionable, and is not good in social situations
nerd.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: someone who knows a lot about a technical subject, usually computers, but who is not good at communicating with people
nerd.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The big market for internet shopping may be not computer nerds but the elderly.
